meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>solve a product equation</term>. Given an equation with only multiplications and divisions, like <inline-math/> or <inline-math/>, you will be able to find the solution, like <inline-math/>. This includes <skill-link>moving equation factors around in the equation</skill-link> until the unknown variable has been isolated, as well as <skill-link>simplifying the result</skill-link> (often a fraction) as much as possible, and subsequently <skill-link>checking it</skill-link>.
